description.value:
The SNODENT identifiers for gross patient findings that inform the course of orthodontic treatment to be performed.
This value set contains content from SNODENT® Copyright American Dental Association (ADA). All rights reserved. SNODENT is a registered trademark of the ADA. http://www.ada.org/en/member-center/member-benefits/practice-resources/dental-informatics/snodent/licensing-snodent

display.value: Deep impinging overbite with soft tissue destruction
Posterior crossbite limited to right side
Lip incompetence due to horizontal overbite
Articulatory defect secondary to dental defect
Posterior crossbite limited to left side
Anterior crossbite with destruction of oral mucosa
